feature_name: Sidekick naming, mode clarity, and mobile install guidance
scope_summary: Restore plain human sidekick names in Hub beta, add an in-app Guide route with FAQ, publish a dedicated website Guide page, align website mode keys/naming to Shades + Sprint/Analytical, and improve mobile header/install discoverability.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: No legal policy language or data processing scope changed.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Changes keep local-first behavior intact and reduce duplicate/privacy-link confusion without adding any new data flows.
evidence: assets/site.js preserves localStorage-only mode state handling

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: UI copy now explains modes directly, reducing cognitive overhead for first-time users.
evidence: index.html adds 'What The Header Toggles Do' section
guide.html adds dedicated quick-start + FAQ content
hub/beta app includes /guide route for in-context help

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Supports state-matching and user autonomy with explicit Sprint/Analytical and low-stim/privacy controls.
evidence: assets/site.js brain mode label and storage normalization updated
partials/header.html reflects Brain Mode: Sprint baseline

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Primary benefit is discoverability and lower confusion; risk is low because behavior is copy/layout/state-key normalization.
evidence: Hub beta rebuilt with sidekick names: Avery, Rick, Aria, Aster, Soren
Legacy shades/brain aliases retained to avoid breaking prior local settings

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Copy remains direct, plain-language, and avoids manipulative framing.
evidence: guide.html plain-language FAQ and quick-start instructions

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Mobile toggle layout now avoids cramped controls and improves readability for smaller screens.
evidence: assets/global.css adds stacked mobile toggle cards at <=720px
mode guide section gives explicit meanings instead of relying on insider terms
header nav now links directly to guide.html from all pages

security_and_reliability.rationale: Hub build sync is now deterministic with corrected asset extraction regex; no privileged logic added.
evidence: hub.html app-inline asset block updated to current built hashes

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing/payment flow changes in this patch.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship as UX clarity and mobile-readiness patch; validate /hub/beta onboarding labels after deploy.
